title: Display property
description: Display configuration for a particular property

enableSort.description: If set to true, data is sortable by this property.

align.description: Where to align the text on the column header (default is 'inherit').

hidden.description: If set to true, data for this property will not show on the table (but might be editable, is set so)

stopPropagation.description: If set to true, clicking this property on the table will not propagate the click event up the tree. Mainly used in combination with a custom renderer. If you are unsure, leave this as is.
